text: "Just a Dream" is a song by American singer Carrie Underwood from her second studio album, Carnival Ride (2007). ==Music video== The music video for "Just a Dream" was directed by Roman White. It premiered on CMT on August 15, 2008. The video debuted at number 19 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of August 15, 2008. The video peaked at number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for seven consecutive weeks. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Just a Dream (Carrie Underwood song)
